data.description:
Xplorer is the leading software for easily and rapidly creating XR training content for industrial enterprise applications. Xplorer enables real time access to AR, VR and 3D work instructions and training to upskill, increase performance, safety and operational efficiency. Advanced industrial XR content (training, presentations on assembly/disassembly, visualization of parts) on complex assets is easily and rapidly created through a platform that uses your content at hand and uses a simple workflow for ease of use, with a wealth of built-in functionality. 

Simple, drag-and-drop UI features, combined with your own content, enable you to build engaging content, simply, quickly, and cost-effectively. 

Xplorer accelerates XR training content development for industrial enterprise customers to address workforce challenges and meet business goals and is the easiest way to create advanced industrial XR content (training, presentations on assembly/disassembly, visualization of parts) on comp

changelog.change_log:
- Optimized lesson syncing
- Update to sync lesson dialog messaging
- Visibility of player UI can now be customized per lesson and role
- Fix for mesh videos overlapping in VR
- Fix for display info popup resizing
- Fix for error when returning after long periods of inactivity

- Combined all display onclick actions into a single Display info action. Display info can now support both text and images together
- Depreciated collaterals menu item. Any lessons utilizing this feature will need to convert their collaterals to display info on click actions
- Custom xapi statement dropdowns are now searchable
- New Hitpoint setting "Scale with camera distance" so they can keep their size a different zoom levels
- Depreciated inspect on-click action
- Fix for models not updating in creator after being overwritten by a new file
- Fix for state list not auto scrolling when you get to the bottom or top of list
- Fix for blank localization table cells not falling back to default language values
- Fix for hitpoints without on-clicks still displaying a hover effect

- Fix for the quest 3 model lighting not matching the PC version
- Fix for quest VR controllers looking offset to observers in multiplayer
- Fix for VR on-click label showing up when it is not set

- Ability to view the same lesson content in different languages if supported in the lesson
- Ability to set preferred language setting
- Ability to resume an interrupted download from partially downloaded state
- Improved error handling on weak network connections during downloading process
- Fixed error when launching multiplayer lessons within nested folders
- Added detailed speed and progress information on project downloads
Corrected issue experienced when launching lessons.

Fix for video loop function still looping when disabled
Minor improvements and bug fixes
